context_bundle.summary: WiX Toolset for creating MSI installers on Windows. Industry-standard tool using XML definitions. Key concepts: Components, Product ID (wildcard), UpgradeCode (constant), WiX 4 via NuGet.

onboarding.quick_start: WiX creates MSI packages from XML. Product Id='*' (auto-gen), UpgradeCode stays constant across versions. Use WiX 4 from NuGet. Components = installation units.
common_patterns: Define Product with wildcard ID for auto-generation

known_errors.error: Upgrade fails to replace old version
known_errors.solution: Keep UpgradeCode constant, only change Product Version
